description:
These gloves will do the trick. The fabric is fully waterproof and highly wind resistant, but the seams are not taped. The combination works great for short duration, low-speed activities when you want something to keep your hands dry and protected.

  • Fabric is a polyester soft shell with a polyurethane waterproof-breathable laminate and a DWR finish
  • Synthetic overlay on index fingers and thumbs adds touchscreen compatibility
  • Grippy palms add durability and, you guessed it, grip
  • Stretchy cuffs keep gusts out
name: MEC Waterproof Enough Gloves - Unisex
